gw.api.exception

Class GWIllegalArgumentException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
            • gw.api.exception.GWIllegalArgumentException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.guidewire.pl.system.exception.ConvertToSOAPException, HasErrorInfo, java.io.Serializable

    public class GWIllegalArgumentException
extends java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
implements HasErrorInfo, com.guidewire.pl.system.exception.ConvertToSOAPException
    This class is a Guidewire replacement for java.lang.IllegalArgumentException. This class will store the name of the argument that is in error, the illegal value, and it may also store the possible acceptable values. Also, this class utilized ErrorInfo so that web services and the rest servlet can externalize that information.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
